mapper.select: SELECT com_id, password, name, authority FROM erpUser WHERE com_id=#{userId}

SELECT emp_id, e.com_id, pwd, emp_name, subs_expiration, e.dept_code FROM employees e JOIN erpSubs s1 ON (e.com_id = s1.com_id) WHERE emp_id=#{username} AND e.com_id=#{comId} AND s1.subs_expiration = (SELECT MAX(subs_expiration) FROM erpSubs WHERE com_id = e.com_id)
